item.title: Code Along - Layout Challenge
item.description: Code Along: Page Layout using Flexbox Using Atom, open the folder called layout_challenge in your html_css_bootcamp folder. You will be using these files as starting off point. As a class, we’ll use flexbox to create the following page layouts (depicted in the images below)
